content: i love a quick project for learning a new technique this scarf is your entrée or introduction to the brioche knit stitch it s knit with a single skein of super bulky yarn so you ll clearly see your stitches as you learn using only two new stitches brioche knit and slip one yarnover you ll make a cozy scarf quick as a wink video tutorials are included for both english and continental style knitting gauge is not critical but will affect the size of your scarf
